name: Hobbit
description: Hobbit by Kannabia Seeds is a resilient autoflowering variety with sweetness and strong elemental resistance. This strain has a sweet aroma that has been described as “strawberry candy” and an equally sweet smoke with latent earthy notes. Hobbit deftly combines stimulating Haze elements with a pervasive body buzz that is lightly weighted while remaining pleasant and functional. Many growers covet this autoflowering wonder for its quick 65 day flowering time and above average yield.
attributes_title: Tingly, Uplifted, Happy, Focused, Hungry, Depression, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Spasticity, Dry Eyes
